data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Gazipur to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Over 99.57 percent of the people of Gazipur are far from Jesus.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jogi (Muslim traditions) people might believe through him.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Gazipur
location.people_groups_list: Kaghazi, Kaora, Kandu, Hazra (Muslim traditions), Khairwar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kaghazi (2,200), Kaora (5,100), Kandu (16,000), Hazra (Muslim traditions) (800), Khairwar (500)
